title: Fostering Multiliteracies and Realizing Educational Equity in the AI Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and secondary-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, including learners with limited AI technology access experience

learning_goals: Learners explain multimodal literacy practices through collaborative content creation using generative AI tools.
Learners evaluate critical engagement competencies by analyzing the social impact of AI technology.
Learners propose ethical principles for AI-based language use that consider cultural diversity.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
